epics.Description: Implement deterministic agent identity issuance, wallet assignment, and funding controls for autonomous economic actors.
Ship tiered autonomy controls with release-blocking no-bypass, determinism, and onboarding SLO gates.

tickets.Summary: Implement passport issuance and lifecycle endpoint
tickets.Description: Add API surface to issue, rotate, expire, and revoke `AgentPassport.v1` with auditable lifecycle events.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Passport issuance endpoint validates schema and signer authority; revoke/expire states are enforced in privileged paid actions; audit trail is queryable.

tickets.Description: Resolve `sponsorWalletRef + policyRef + policyVersion` from tenant environment profile risk tier and delegation depth.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Resolver returns deterministic mapping for identical inputs; resolver output is embedded into passport and settlement decision metadata; e2e tests cover dedicated vs pooled wallet assignment.

tickets.Summary: Add funding policy and top-up automation
tickets.Description: Introduce threshold-based funding policy for managed and BYO rails with reserve rollback guarantees.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Wallet funding thresholds are configurable per policy; top-up flow emits deterministic events; failed reserve/top-up paths roll back cleanly without double-settlement.

tickets.Summary: Bind execution intent to authorization and settlement
tickets.Description: Require `ExecutionIntent.v1` hash and request fingerprint to match authorize-payment and settlement verification paths.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Authorize-payment rejects intent mismatch with stable codes; settlement verification rechecks intent binding; mutation/replay attempts fail in deterministic tests.

tickets.Description: Ship `Tier0..Tier4` policy/profile packs with explicit spend/risk/delegation constraints and upgrade criteria.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Tier policy packs are versioned and simulatable via CLI; each tier maps to concrete allowlists and spend limits; migration guidance is documented.

tickets.Summary: Add no-bypass and authority boundary gate suite
tickets.Description: Create release-blocking negative tests for MCP stdio bridge HTTP and gateway paths plus signer/control authority boundary violations.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Bypass attempts fail deterministically in CI; unauthorized signer/control actions fail with stable codes; suite is mandatory in release workflow.

tickets.Summary: Add onboarding and autonomy readiness SLO gates
tickets.Description: Gate release on first-paid-call runtime SLO and policy decision latency/error SLO across host compatibility matrix.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: SLO thresholds are codified and enforced in CI; regression fails release gates; reports include per-host readiness and failure reasons.
